thread.title: Big Brother Naija: Soma becomes the 1st housemate to leave the Big Brother Naija house
thread.title_full: Big Brother Naija: Soma becomes the 1st housemate to leave the Big Brother Naija house

author: Chidumga Izuzu
title: Big Brother Naija: Soma becomes the 1st housemate to leave the Big Brother Naija house
text:
The Big Brother Naija second Live Nomination show is on and Soma has become the first housemate to leave the reality series. He was up for eviction alongside Efe and Miyonse. Soma was nominated by Bally, Kemen and Cocoice. He was in a 'relationship' with Gifty. Somadina popularly called Soma is a graphic artist, producer, model and singer, Soma had described himself as "a lot of things." He had promised viewers "Telemundo kind of drama" during his introduction on the reality series. 
Soma: "Your lips are so beautiful! I could kiss them forever... I don't have a girlfriend!" https://t.co/8CAVj1CJQ0 â€” Big Brother Naija (@BBNaija) 2013-07-22 14:22:09.0 
Gifty's eyes rolling while SOMA's fingers are digging deep... I can imagine the wetness... #BBNaija https://t.co/cPh5kl6G8w
